comment: Terrible teacher. Stands in front of his power point and reads them word for word. His directions are never clear and tests were lengthy. Don't take if you want to get a decent grade
Do not buy the book, the test questions come straight from the notes, which are posted online. You do have to study for his tests, it's not a give me class.

Not a dynamic professor. Tests consist of 100 questions. A lot of content to cover in a short period.Will call you and go over test questions with you if you want to. Shows lots of videos and some of test questions come from videos. If you are not interested in history, choose a different professor.
Easy A if you go to class and halfway study. Tests come straight from lecture notes, you can also do a project in order to not take the test. He is boring though and I hated going to his class.

attend. sign in sheet. 10 tests come strictly from his lecture notes.Notes come from webct & he reads it word4word w/ some side comments. He seems bored when he's teaching.I love history but this class made me feel that it's boring. Easy class though
All I can say is...this guy is giving away A's.

SUPER EASY! test comes directly from the handouts. He also gives you the option to do a bookreview or class presentation instead of a test. DO IT! Its super easy. make a power point and read straight from it. You will get an A. Mr Kempf is a nice guy!
Test questions come straight from his handouts - which are posted on WebCT!  Easy prof!

Super easy class. posts notes and then shows a movie for each test. Boring but go to class bc attendance is mandatory. 10 v easy mult ch tests, some only 10 questions long! Made an easy A w/o ever looking at book and just studying his notes night before exam.
Instructor gives you everything you need to do well in his class -- handouts & study guides. Alot to learn at times. Attendance is important. Very nice professor.

EASY EASY, Gives handouts and post all notes you need for test on WEBCT, you will not ever use your book. Frustrating class becuase you don't NEED to go to ace the test but he takes attendance daily, many interesting History channel movies, weekly test(more like Quizes) get old but they are easy if you read and follow the study guides. NICE GUY

He must have some kind of social disorder...he never looks at the class when he talks. Class is in a 3 stage rotation: 1st day, he gives you the questions to review for the test, the 2nd day, you watch a history channel movie, and the 3rd is the test. 10 tests in all. Attendance is mandatory. Frustrating class, but super easy.
Gives hand outs, tests are based on handouts, 10 tests drops to lowest two. Easy A, alot of cramming, short classes.

Great teacher, all of his tests are multiple choice.  Gives 10 tests but drops the two lowest ones.  Great guy.  Even if you miss class he lets you make up tests.  If you have transferred to KSU like most students and need  a history class TAKE HIM!!!
